name: Ocean Highway Patrol
description:
2 player co-op (or 1 player with 2 or more hands).

Make sure no one goes over the speed limit!

7DFPS game

Player 1 Controls:

move with WASD

Player 2 Controls:

aim with Mouse

use item with LMB

switch item with RMB

Made by

@BarnabyRW - Art, Design & Programming

@princezaet - Art & Design

@DomWillmott - Sound Design & Music

@ReubenCovington - Programming

for the 7 Day FPS

http://7dfps.com/
